profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher Energy and climate strategies

profile_positions.description:
RESEARCH THEME
‘Analyzing the interaction between global cooling demand and climate change and the consequences of related international policy approaches’ 
Promotor: 	Professor A.J.M. Schoot Uiterkamp

RESEARCH TOPICS	
- Assessing policy approaches to reduce HFC emissions in refrigeration and air conditiong
- Modeling Chinese fluorinated GHG emissions  
- Differences in policy design between the Montreal Protocol and the Kyoto Protocol and their effect on stakeholder cooperation
- Involving developing countries in international climate policy 
- The temperature dependence of electricity demand in the Netherlands
- Modeling future energy demand in the context of climate change
- Evaluating possible inclusion of fluorinated gases in emissions trading
profile_positions.title: PhD Fellow Environmental Sciences
